creator: Eurosystem2000 s.r.l.
descriptionHtml: DIGITAL IRRIGATION  system grants a completely integrated management in which the user is able to analyze, manage with a single interface, all his machines and to consider the environment (field, crop, weather) in which they operate. The portal is “hosted” on the Cloud. Field devices exchange data with a webserver continuously. An artificial intelligence analyzes the data and provides the user with all the information needed to manage his irrigation. The humidity sensors inform about the state of the soil and combined with weather forecasts, indicate, where, when and how to irrigate.

title: Digital Irrigation

container.value: Strada Ponte Alto Sud, 74 - 41123 - MODENA - Italia

creator: EUROSYSTEM2000 S.R.L.
descriptionHtml:
The DIGITAL IRRIGATION platform guarantees timely and optimised irrigation management, in which the user is able to manage all his irrigation machines with absolute precision in relation to the context (field, crop, weather) in which they are operating.

Thanks to the new integrated DIGITAL IRRIGATION APP, analysis and management of the systems can take place on the move, anytime and anywhere. Push notifications ensure real-time alerts on alarms, status changes and machine information.

With the APP you can:

- Fully manage your irrigation machines: switch on, switch off and change working parameters
- View the status of your machines (flow, pressure, speed,...)
- Receive notifications in real time
- Have the ‘Map’ function available for mission control (route)
- Have the ‘Weather’ function available to assess when to activate or not to activate the machines remotely
- Open service requests for machine maintenance
- View the history of all maintenance performed

The best way to manage your irrigation system.

appDetails.developerAddress: Strada Ponte Alto Sud, 74 - 41123 - MODENA - Italia

title:
Digital Irrigation
1.4.0

container.value: Strada Ponte Alto Sud, 74 - 41123 - MODENA - Italia
